sentences: Tema hiilgav esitus võitis kõikide austuse.
Nad tegid hiilgava töö sellel projektil.
context: The Estonian word 'hiilgav' is an adjective that means brilliant, glorious, splendid, or radiant. It describes something that shines brightly, either literally (like light) or figuratively (like an achievement, idea, or performance). The word can be used to describe physical brightness as well as excellence and impressiveness in quality.
